website_summaries.verdict: These fun motivational stickers give a boost to learners of all ages.
pros: A great value with over 1,000 stickers in the package
Self-adhesive stickers display positive messages loud and clear
Use them to reward and recognize
cons: Buyers should note the size of the stickers (.75 inches in diameter) to avoid disappointment

customer_reviews.title: Very motivational!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I was looking for stickers that I could use on my self-care calendar to show when I succeeded in doing what I was supposed to do for myself such as working out or eating right. I'm very visual and easily motivated by these types of things so this system works perfect for me. Great little stickers!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Keegan

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work with potty training
customer_reviews.text: We got this for potty training our daughter as a good job kinda thing. So far it helps along with a timer on when its time to go
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great size and shape. Exactly what I wanted.  Quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: As a teacher, my students love stickers when they get good grades. These are perfect and came in the mail quickly and in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: P Fiegen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect motivation for students.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my grade 2 kids! They truly enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Melisha

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Stickers are nice - but disappointing in the size - -for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki S.

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: The product was used for motivating students by rewarding them for various achievements. The price was a little too high.
customer_reviews.author: HL

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Good price smaller than expected but still did the trick...
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline sanders

customer_reviews.title: Saves me some headache w/my 2 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 2 year old son as a reward for good behavior. He will usually fight me for bath time, brushing teeth, and/or changing his diaper. I cut them in various quantities based on the task at hand. Bath time he will get 2 full rows of stickers. A diaper change he gets 1 row, etc. it has worked well so far!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: great incentive!
customer_reviews.text: The stickers are a hit with my students! They are the major part of my classroom reward system. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great for teachers
customer_reviews.text: I love to use these on students' paper that I do not need to grade. I put a sticker on the papers and the students know that I have reviewed their paper.
customer_reviews.author: solsister8

customer_reviews.title: great little motivational stickers
customer_reviews.text: kids like them, unfortunately they closed the schools so I never got to use them
customer_reviews.author: cab4328

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very sticky backing. Not too sticky, just the right amount. A good value product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but get job done
customer_reviews.text: Small stickers but they work for preschool books for my daughters.
customer_reviews.author: MommyOf3

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: I feel like these were way smaller than they appeared in the pictures. I am using them anyways, but definitely not as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S Julian-Russell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I teach moderate to severely disabled highschoolers. I think the parents love and appreciate the stickers even more than the students.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Warfighter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These look to be great motivational stickers. Bought for a teacher friend whom I sure will be delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Youtz

customer_reviews.title: These are very thick and a good size for charts!
customer_reviews.text: These will work perfectly for spelling tests/graded papers. They are pretty thick and very brightly colored! Not paper thin like a lot of stickers you buy in bulk. They all have an affirmation on them, but none that are subject/school specific, so they could be used for any school paper or for reward charts at home with the kids. They would be great for potty training toddlers because I bet they would stick on little hands and last a good while.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Easy positives :)
customer_reviews.text: Sent these to a new pandemic caused homeschool to add a positive element. They were glad to get them.
customer_reviews.author: amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for recognizing students ofr their efforts on report cards.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn V.

product_meta.title: Teacher Reward Motivational Stickers for Children (Set of 1,080)
product_meta.description:
Teacher Reward Motivational Stickers: 

 * 9 unique designs 
 * 1,080 stickers (12 sheets) 


Use in the Classroom:  * Graded Paper Stickers 
 * Report Card Stickers 


Stick On Candy:  * Hershey’s Kisses 
 * Reese’s Cups Minis 
 * Rolo Chewy Caramels 
 * Note: do NOT use on mints 


People Also Use As:  * Reading Reward Chart Stickers
 * Envelope Seals 
 * Scrapbook Stickers 


Proudly Made in the USA by Distinctivs.
feature_bullets: 1,080 Motivational Teacher Reward Stickers for the Classroom.
9 Designs with Words of Encouragement for Students to Stick on Graded Papers.
Bright, Motivational Designs Make These Reward Stickers Great for Preschool through Elementary Students.
Worksheets and Other Props Not Included. Reward Stickers are Must-Have Teacher Supplies for Classroom.
